title: SET Rotation Collision - avg torque on disk 2

content.question: The interval of time <math alttext="delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></math> is the elapsed time from the moment of first contact between the two disks until they are both rotating at the same angular velocity. Which of the following expressions is the magnitude of the average torque that Disk <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> exerts on Disk <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="M times R squared, times omega sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator M times R squared, times omega sub f, and denominator delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator M times R squared, times omega sub f, and denominator 2 delta t, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 M times R squared, times omega sub f, and denominator delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator M times R squared, times omega sub f, and denominator 2 delta t, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
